mapper.update: UPDATE transaction SET payment_option = #{paymentOption:CHAR}, receiver_name= #{receiverName:VARCHAR}, receiver_phone= #{receiverPhone:VARCHAR}, demailaddr= #{divyAddr:VARCHAR}, dlvy_request= #{divyRequest:VARCHAR}, dlvy_date= #{divyDate:DATE} WHERE tran_no = #{tranNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.*, ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT T.tran_no, T.order_data, P.prod_no, P.prod_name, T.receiver_name, T.demailaddr, T.tran_status_code, T.payment_option FROM transaction T, product P WHERE P.prod_no = T.prod_no AND buyer_id = #{userId} ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{search.currentPage}*#{search.pageSize} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN (#{search.currentPage}-1)*#{search.pageSize}+1 AND #{search.currentPage}*#{search.pageSize}
